Nothing about converting textures. If I rerun it as `deploy.sh -m`, the output's truncated, but I get a bunch of statements like


```
#!bash

['sed', '-i', '-e', '/[a-zA-Z0-9_\\.\\/\\-]\\+materials\\/textures/!s/\\([a-zA-Z0-9_\\-]\\+\\)\\(\\.png\\W\\)/\\.\\.\\/materials\\/textures\\/\\1\\2/g', '/home/nick/gzweb/http/client/assets/house_2/meshes/house_2.dae']

```

followed by the thumbnail generation error:


```
#!bash

Generating a thumbnail for each model. Make sure gazebo is not running
Creating thumbnail for asphalt_plane
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 2.2.5
Copyright (C) 2012-2014 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

Warning [Converter.cc:59]   Version[1.5] to Version[1.4]
  Please use the gzsdf tool to update your SDF files.
    $ gzsdf convert [sdf_file]
Error [Converter.cc:127] Unable to convert from SDF version 1.5 to 1.4
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.20.20
Error [Node.cc:90] No namespace found

```
